item.title: By: WC Lathe Werks Titanium Shift Knob | Grand Mighty
item.dc:creator: WC Lathe Werks Titanium Shift Knob | Grand Mighty
item.description: […] work is continued on the car, here is a mid-week update to tide things over. When ordering the MGW Short Shifter, I opted for a threaded lever in M12x1.75 rather than the stock, slotted style lever for Camaros. […]
